data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hauser, Martin, Webb, Donald W. (2007): A revision of the new world stiletto fly genus Ataenogera Kröber (Diptera: Therevidae: Phycinae) with the description of two new species. Zootaxa 1530: 41-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177666
